sentences.en: He confessed that he was a religious believer, an admirer of capitalism, and a sexual pervert.
sentences.cn: 他招认他笃信宗教, 崇拜资本主义, 是个老色鬼.

sentences.en: He is a firm believer in total quality management.
sentences.cn: 他是个极力主张全面质量管理的人。
他根本不相信会有奇迹.

sentences.en: I made no secret of the fact that I was not a believer.
I'm a firm believer in always telling the truth.
I'm a firm believer in the benefits of exercise.
sentences.cn: 我对运动的好处坚信不疑.

sentences.en: I'm a firm believer in'where there's a will , there's a way.'
sentences.cn: 你只管放心.我平日相信 ‘ 有志者, 事竟成 ’ 的话.

sentences.en: I'm a great believer in the benefits of this form of therapy.
sentences.cn: 我坚信这种治疗形式非常有益。

sentences.en: I'm a passionate believer in public art.
sentences.cn: 我是公共艺术的狂热信徒。

sentences.en: I'm a strong believer in the dignity of labor.
If the believer rejects it, he becomes to that extent a heretic.
sentences.cn: 如果信徒抛弃它, 在某种程度上就变成了异教徒.

sentences.en: Mum was a great believer in herbal medicines.
My mother was a great believer in horoscopes all her life.
sentences.cn: 我母亲一辈子对占星术笃信不移.

sentences.en: Teddy is a great believer in finding happy medium.
sentences.cn: 特迪是个十足的中庸之道的信仰者.

sentences.en: The boss was a firm believer in developing strong teamwork.
sentences.cn: 老板对培育坚强团队精神的重要性深信不疑.
